df = spark.read.json('people.json')
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
df.show()        # zeigt die Daten
df.printSchema() # zeigt das Schema
df.columns       # Attribut mit den Columnnames
df.describe()    # Beschreibung

+----+-------+
| age|   name|
+----+-------+
|null|Michael|
|  30|   Andy|
|  19| Justin|
+----+-------+

root
 |-- age: long (nullable = true)
 |-- name: string (nullable = true)
